alert.note: Alert for Calcasieu (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 24 at 10:47AM CDT until April 28 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana... Calcasieu River NEAR White Oak Park Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Calcasieu River NEAR White Oak Park. * WHEN...Until early Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 2.0 feet, Minor flooding of Goos Ferry Road will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:55 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 2.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:55 AM CDT Sunday was 2.4 feet. - Forecast...The river will oscillate around flood stage with a maximum value of 2.3 feet this evening. - Flood stage is 2.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
